cause.description:
Starting from the breeding department, puppy starters, puppy raisers, Guide dog trainers, to the dogs that lead those whom are blind. Every moment means something, anything can help. From donating money so someone with no money can help support themselves and a dog, to raising and training the puppies from the start. To just giving good blessings to those involved. Or thanking those you meet.
1. Guide Dogs are proven to help those unsighted get better jobs
2. Guide Dogs for the Blind helps support those unable to pay
3. These dogs save peoples lives, they just do it in a different way
cause.mission: to educate those who are unaware of the program
cause.name: Guide Dogs for the Blind
